title.default: ON SALE for Pure Writer 5th Anniversary & 2022 11·11
title.zh: 「双十一」特惠和纯纯写作五周年活动

message.default:
In 2017, Pure Writer launched its first version on Google Play, starting a long "five-year project". During these 5 years, we submitted a total of 8,500 updates, ranging from v1.0 to v21.0.5, in the latest version, we have implemented important functions such as Cloud Sync & Smooth Unlimited Words.

Therefore, during 2022.10.31 ~ 2022.11.12, the Double Eleven Shopping Festival, Pure Writer Pro (lifetime), originally priced at $21.99, is discounted to $13.99 — Lowest price of the year.
message.zh:
2017 年纯纯写作上架了第一个版本，从此开启了漫长的「五年工程」，在这五年里，我们共提交了 8500 多次更新，版本号从 v1.0 到如今的 v21.0.5，在最新版中，我们实现了「云同步」、「流畅的无限字数」等许多重要功能，这真是一个非常难得的里程碑，可喜可贺。

因此，值此「双十一」购物节，纯纯写作 Pro（永久会员）现提供短期大幅降价优惠，全年最低价！

在纯纯写作 Pro 页面底部可查看最新优惠售价。
